body:

Thank you to all the booksellers who are championing this release by opening their doors to little olâ€™ me.

A _huge_ thank you to my wonderful moderators and fellow panellists. You guys rock, Iâ€™m so excited to do these events with you.

These arenâ€™t the only events Iâ€™ll be doing this year - thereâ€™ll be many more festivals and events to come.

And if youâ€™re based on the US East Coast keep an eye out in the coming weeks...

Tickets are limited and selling fast. Visit the [Events page](https://jimdynasty.github.io/SEAweb/events.html) for ticket links!
